# Data Processing

## Question 1: Reading in Data 

```{r}
EDU01 = read_csv("EDU01a.csv", show_col_types = F) %>%
  select(Area_name, STCOU, ends_with("D")) %>%
  rename(area_name = Area_name)

head(EDU01, 5)
```

## Question 2: Pivot Data

```{r}
EDU01_long = EDU01 %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = ends_with("D"), 
    names_to = "surveyID", 
    values_to = "enrollment"
  )

head(EDU01_long, 5)
```
